name: Liftboy (Tomate Salat)
description:
Liftboy is a simple game about robots and elevators. On regular base robots are spawning and want to reach a certain floor. You can control the cabin of the lift. With a simple click it will halt at the closest floor. Then robots can leave and enter the cabin. So you are actually the liftboy (or girl).

You will get points based on how fast a robot reaches his floor. Robots won't wait forever. If it takes too long then you will loose points.

The game comes with several levels (also endless ones) plus an interactive tutorial.

Liftboy is completley free and without any ads or analytis. 

If you are interessted in what I'm doing at the moment (of course game related) then you can follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/tomate_salat

Thanks for playing my game :-)
